release.action: replace the non-public dependency javax.transaction:jta by org.apache.geronimo.specs:geronimo-jta_1.0.1B_spec which is available in public repositories.
addition of French Translation for Dashboard.
Correction of dashboard system output to maven's log.
Correction of wrong UTF-8 support in generated graphs.
Addition of the "Maven 1.x like" global dashboard.
unused report plugins won't be part of the dashboard.
addition of Total count for each table in detailled report.
addition of Database support and Historic's restitution. Thanks to the French Postal Service for the donation of all sources code to the community.
addition of FindBugs support.
NPE correction in a particular three level multimodule build.
addition of Clover support.
Correction of percentage and rendering errors on "Show Checkstyle categories".
addition of "Show Checkstyle categories" pie chart as done in Checkstyle Eclipse plugin.
NPE correction if dashboard called on parent project due to cobertura version discovery (DashBoardUtils.getCoberturaDatafile() method).
correction of a regression with the report output directory for dashboard. Introduced by MOJO-690 fix.
correction of dashboard-report-details.html missing for multi-modules project with site:stage goal .
correction of PMD/CPD fixed x-axis problem for bar chart. Only Cobertura Bar Chart has a 100D fixed axis .
correction of unreadable bar chart for multi-modules project. use of offset to extend chart height.
Correction of NPE when running site in non-recursive mode (mvn -N site). For multi-modules project, the dashboard will not be generated, with an error message in Maven log.
Correction of NumberFormatException in Cobertura plugin version discovery (DashBoardUtils.getCoberturaDatafile() method). Fixed by use of DefaultArtifactVersion class.
All forbidden characters as {'\\','/',':','*','?','"','<','>',';'} will be replaced by a '-' character.
use of NumberFormat expression with the default Locale instead of Double.parseDouble expression.
The search of cobertura.ser file must be done in the 2 directories to keep dashboard's compatibility for cobertura-maven-plugin 2.0 and 2.1 .
Correction of LineCoverRate calcul for multi-project summary.
add Xalan 2.0.7 dependency in pom.xml to keep compatibility with JDK1.5 for Xalan XPath API used in dashboard
relocation of XStream dependency from xstream to com.thoughtworks.xstream .
support of the change of Surefire's output directory by the configuration's discovery of maven-surefire-plugin.
Add navigation links to project's name in detailed dashboard report.
Correction of CheckStyle, PMD and CPD errors.
addition of a JDepend/Cobertura Xref section with aggregation of the afferent couplings and the cover rate for each package, ordered by descendant afferent couplings.
